price: 5. Na elonga bwa Allah. Alongisaka oyo alingi, mpe azali na nguya atonda ngolu.
arabic: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: binaṣri al-lahi yanṣuru man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
